#summary Create or update an inventory item.
#labels Protocol-Inventory

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||RequestMethod||AddInventoryItem||String||Yes||
||ID||UUID of the item to create or update||UUID||Optional||
||AssetID||UUID of the asset associated with this item||UUID||Yes||
||ParentID||UUID of the parent folder||UUID||Yes||
||OwnerID||UUID of the item owner||UUID||Yes||
||Name||Name of the item||String||Yes||
||Description||Description of the item||String||Optional, defaults to an empty string||

  * ID is only required for updating an existing item

{{{
POST /services/ HTTP/1.1
User-Agent: Simian Login Client
Host: thorium.npl.com
Accept: */*
Content-Length: 164
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

RequestMethod=AddInventoryItem
&AssetID=1def56c1-6b83-492d-a7c1-2252b5545a82
&ParentID=40f36b6d-d239-4ade-b354-f0f5cb9ce8f8
&OwnerID=8e21c2df-32b2-472c-b09b-88b909ba4c86
&Name=A+Picture
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||ItemID||UUID of the newly created item||UUID||

{{{
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Sun, 13 Dec 2009 07:23:43 GMT
Server: Apache/2.2.10 (Linux/SUSE)
X-Powered-By: Simian Grid Services
Content-Length: 49
Content-Type: application/json

{ "ItemID":"2cf49939-b9f0-45af-ad21-b3441de85f52" }
}}}

= Supported Response Codes =

  * 200
    * A new item was successfully created
  * 500
    * Internal server error occurred
